Localization.Name: Virgil
Localization.Description:
High-end Commercial and Personal armor manufacturer. Aside from combat uses, they build systems for heavy commercial and mining applications.

Models: Achilles PDS (Heavy Combat Armor)

Zeus System (Titan Armor)

English.Name: Virgil
English.Description:
High-end Commercial and Personal armor manufacturer. Aside from combat uses, they build systems for heavy commercial and mining applications.

Models: Achilles PDS (Heavy Combat Armor)

Zeus System (Titan Armor)

Localization.Name: TrueDef-Pro Core Black/Pink/Purple
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Light Armor
Damage Reduction: 20%
Temp. Rating: -35 / 65 °C
Radiation Protection: 26000 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 145.8 REM/s
Carrying Capacity: 2.0 µSCU
Backpacks: Light

Virgil's TrueDef line of personal body armor provide strategic protection of vital areas while keeping you fast and mobile. Numerous planetary law enforcement organizations and even the Advocacy use versions of the TrueDef to protect their officers and agents.
